briefTitle: Optical Trocar to Create the Pneumoperitoneum in Bariatric Patients
officialTitle: Optical Trocar to Facilitate the Pneumoperitoneum Creation in Bariatric Patients: Our Experience and Systematic Review

eligibilityCriteria.criteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

BMI\>40 kg/m2 BMI\>35 kg/m2with at least one associated major comorbidity

Exclusion Criteria:

secondary obesity due to endocrine and psychological disorders

primary.measure: optical trocar to induce the pneumoperitoneum
primary.description: the use of optical trocar to facilitate the creation of the pneumoperitoneum in obese patients underwent bariatric surgery

primary.measure: complication rate using optical trocar to create the pneumopritoneum in laparoscopic surgery
primary.description: in literature we observe a low complication rate which include bowel and vessel injuries
